title: Changing from NA to EUNE/EUW
body:
Hello! When I registered this account, I had my VPN on USA. So, my account is on NA, I can play but I get 120+ms every game.

I wanted to change the region for quite some time. They said it would be on 21 November, then 7 December and it's still not available.

Anyone know anything?


Thanks!

replies.body: You're not alone, friend.  A lot of players are eager to transfer and it absolutely sucks that it's still down.  Our devs are working on repairing transfers, though I really have no ETA on when that will be.

WAIT!!! I have this  conspiracy theory right now that this is all a scam, a goof a gaf and a scheme! You guys are working with the illuminatie, you will release this update and more people will pay you! 

#Exposed! #MakeFrogsNotGayAgain!
Yeah there are some technical issues right now, but the account transfer will be up as soon as possible when the problems are solved.
